title: Did Pelosi issue a statement calling Kevin McCarthy "Q-CA "?
subtitle: A news release from Nancy Pelocci's office contained holes in Kevin McCarthy.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Office of the President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belosi, published a press release referring to the political affiliation of the leader of the Beit Kevin McCarthy minority as "Q-CA" in reference to the QANON conspiracy movement.
